include("CPM")
set(FETCHCONTENT_BASE_DIR ${SPACE_EXTERNAL_DIR}/CPM)
list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${SPACE_EXTERNAL_DIR})
list(APPEND CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH ${SPACE_EXTERNAL_DIR})

include(glew)
include(glfw)
include(glm)
#include(assimp)
#include(sdl2)
#include(sdl_image)
#include(sndfile)
#include(soloud)
include(imgui)
include(catch2)
include(spdlog)

set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH} PARENT_SCOPE)
